DocAttribute.Name: Depth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Web lengths, see illustration above (= h).

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeWidth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Flange lengths, see illustration above (= b).

DocAttribute.Name: WebThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of web (= ts).

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Constant wall thickness of flange (= tg).

DocAttribute.Name: FilletRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Fillet radius according the above illustration (= r1). If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: EdgeRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: Edge radius according the above illustration (= r2). If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: FlangeSlope
DocAttribute.Documentation: Slope of flange of the profile. If it is not given, zero is assumed.

DocAttribute.Name: CentreOfGravityInX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Location of centre of gravity along the x axis measured from the center of the bounding box. > IFC2x Edition 2 Addendum 2 CHANGE The attribute CentreOfGravityInX has been made optional. Upward compatibility for file based exchange is guaranteed.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The flange thickness shall be smaller than half of the depth.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR22
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The web thickness shall be smaller than the flange width.
